faq.answers1: The Thailand PDPA stands for the new Personal Data Protection Act B.E.2652 of the Kingdom of Thailand. It was passed in 2019 and  has effected businesses starting from May 28th 2020. PDPA is the most comprehensive Thai data privacy law to date. It expands on the rights of users whose data you collect, which means expanding on your obligations as well.
faq.question2: Is PDPA similar to other data protection laws, such as the GDPR?
faq.answers2: The Thailand PDPA follows the trend set by the GDPR. It has many similarities with this regulation, as well as with data protection laws of East and South-East Asia. If your business complies with the GDPR, it would be easy to comply with the PDPA as well
faq.question3: When will the Personal Protection Data Act (PDPA) be enforced in Thailand?
faq.answers3: It will be fully implemented on June 1st, 2021
faq.question4: What are the penalties for non-compliance with the Personal Protection Data Act (PDPA)?
faq.answers4:
Enforcement and Penalties 
1.Civil Liability 
- Fine twice the amount of the actual damage 
2.Criminal Liability 
- Imprisonment not over a year or fine not over one million baht or both 
3.Administrative Liability 
- On any offender in the form of an administrative fine not over from  5 million baht depending on the liability of this act

policy_data.title: beCOOKIES Privacy Notice

description.text: beCOOKIES ("we" or "us" or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data and ensuring compliance with the data protection laws. This privacy notice will inform you as to how we process your personal data when you visit and use beCOOKIES services, and what measures we exercise to protect your personal data under Thai Personal Data Protection Act and other applicable laws

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.text1: "You" means Data subject who wants to apply or becomes a registered beCOOKIES user
definitions.text2: "beCOOKIES" means the data controller for th­e processing your personal data described in this notice
definitions.text3: "Personal data" means your personal identifiable information considered under Thai Personal Data Protection Act and other applicable laws
definitions.text4: "Processing" means any operation or set of operations performed upon your personal data, such as collection, use, recording/structuring or storage, transmission and disclosure, and erasure and anonymization of your personal data

how_to_collect.title: How we collect your personal data

description.top: beCOOKIES services are mainly offered to businesses and organizations. Financial data and transactional data will be considered as non-personal data as they relate to the organization you represent and not you, based on the definitions of personal data under most data protection laws. However, we may collect or receive your personal data from the business or organization you represent if you are authorized to use our services in connection with your business or organization’s account.
description.text1: 1. ­­Personal data that we collect from you directly when you apply for our services and fill out your personal data online includes your name, username, title, the identity of the organization you represent
description.text2: 2. Personal data that we automatically collect from your equipment and browsing activities. We collect these technical data and usage data by using cookies and similar technologies. We also receive technical data about you if you visit other websites employing beCOOKIES’s cookies.
description.mid: We may collect or receive different types of personal data which we have grouped together as follows:

sub1.head: 1. Identity Data
sub1.content: includes your first name, last name, title and identity of the organization you represent

sub2.head: 2. User Profile Data
sub2.content: includes your username and password, interests, preferences, purchase orders on beCOOKIES made by you, and feedback and survey responses

sub3.head: 3. Communication Data
sub3.content: includes your addresses, email, and telephone numbers

sub4.head: 4. Financial Data
sub4.content: includes details about payments to and from you and other details of orders made by you, and bank account and payment card details

sub5.head: 5. Technical Data
sub5.content: includes IP Address, your login data, browser type and version, time zone setting and location, and platform technical data of the devices you use to access and interact with our websites to offer our beCOOKIES services

description.buttom: beCOOKIES are "not" intended to provide services to children and we do not collect or receive any of your sensitive data (or special category data under Article 26 of PDPA). If we want to process your sensitive data, we will explicitly obtain your consent before we collect or receive your personal data or when in the circumstances that the law allows us to use your personal data.

purposes.title: The purposes and the legal basis
purposes.description: beCOOKIES will only process your personal data with the followings purposes, and which of the legal bases we rely on to do so.

1. Identity Data
2. User Profile Data
3. Communication Data

body_row1.col3:

body_row2.col3:
1. Necessary for our legitimate interests for operating beCOOKIES services, protecting our service information security and preventing unauthorized access and fraud
2. Necessary to comply with a legal obligation under Computer Crime Act

2. User Profile Data
3. Communication Data
body_row3.col3: 1. Explicitly obtain your consent(s) to specific marketing purpose(s)

body_row4.col2: beCOOKIES will inform you other further purposes we set out in our Privacy Notice before or at the point where we collect or receive your personal data.  We will use your personal data only in the specific purpose(s) that you have provided your consent(s) or when in the circumstances that applicable laws allow us to.

disclosure.title: Disclosure of Personal data to Third Parties
disclosure.desc1: beCOOKIES may disclose your personal data for the specified purposes with your consent to the following persons and entities
disclosure.text1: 1. beCOOKIES’s staff and employees on the need-to-know basis
disclosure.text2: 2. Other data controllers or data processors on the specified purposed with your explicit consent or under the criteria prescribed by applicable laws
disclosure.text3: 3. Data controllers or data processors outside the country which ensures the adequate level of personal data protection in compliance with Thai Personal Data Protection Act
disclosure.desc2: beCOOKIES may transfer your personal data to cloud service providers or payment processing providers in the countries outside Thailand. We will ensure that your personal data receive an adequate level of protection by use of standard contractual clauses used in European Union or by the adequacy decision made by the Thai Data Protection Commission.

data_retentions.title: Data Retention
data_retentions.desc1: beCOOKIES retain your personal data we collect for the specified purposes with your consent. When we have no ongoing legitimate business need to process your personal data, we will either delete or anonymize them.
data_retentions.desc2: Data may be retained for different periods based upon the processing purposes or the necessaries to comply with a legal obligation.
data_retentions.text1: 1. Identity Data will be deleted or anonymized immediately when we have no ongoing legitimate business need to do so.
data_retentions.text2: 2. User Profile Data will be deleted or anonymized immediately when we have no ongoing legitimate business need to do so.
data_retentions.text3: 3. Communication data will be saved for one year after you withdraw your consent or you cancel beCOOKIES services.
data_retentions.text4: 4. Financial data will be saved to demonstrate the agreement we have/have had and for accounting and tax purposes for up to five full fiscal years.
data_retentions.text5: 5. Technical data will be saved for 90 days after we collect the data or for any longer period under the criteria prescribed by applicable laws.

exercise.title: Exercise your personal data protection rights
exercise.desc1: beCOOKIES respects the privacy of our customers and we provide the certain data protection rights for you to exercise them in accordance with applicable personal data protection laws.
exercise.text1: 1. Request access to your personal data (also known as data subject access request). This enables you to receive a copy of the personal data we hold about you and to check that we have lawfully collected it.
exercise.text2: 2. Request correction of the personal data that we hold about you. This enables you to have any incomplete or inaccurate information we hold about you rectified.
exercise.text3: 3. Request transfer of your personal data to another party (also known as data portability) when it is technically feasible.
exercise.text4: 4. Request erasure of your personal data. This enables you to ask us to delete or remove personal data where there is no good reason for us continuing to process it.
exercise.text5: 5. Object to processing of your personal data where we are relying on a legitimate interest (or those of a third party) and there is something about your particular situation which makes you want to object to processing on this ground, for example if you want to object the processing your personal data for direct marketing purposes, or when the purposes have changed and you do not agree to give the consent.
exercise.text6: 6. Request the restriction of processing of your personal data. This enables you to ask us to suspend the processing of personal data about you, for example if you want us to establish its accuracy or the reason for processing it.
exercise.text7: 7. Where our processing is solely based on your specific consent you have the right to with-draw your consent at any time.
exercise.text8: 8. You have the right to complain to Thai Data Protection Authority if you found any negligence, malpractice, or misconduct in protecting your privacy carried by beCOOKIES.
exercise.desc2: When beCOOKIES receive your request, we will respond within the time limit in accordance with applicable personal data protection laws.

security.title: Security Measures for Personal Data Protection
security.desc: beCOOKIES was designed according to the principles of Privacy-by-Design and Security-by-Design, we use trusted technologies and qualified cloud service providers who have registered with international security and privacy protection standards namely ISO/IEC 27001:2013, 27701:2019, 27017:2015, 27018:2019, ISO/IEC 9001:2015 and CSA STAR CCM v3.0.1. In addition, beCOOKIES has implemented access control measures to ensure that your personal data are well guarded and have sufficient and adequacy protection from any unauthorized access person.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Notice
changes.desc: beCOOKIES will review and update this Privacy Notice annually to reflect changing of legal, regulatory, operational requirements, or to meet international technical standards. If there are any changes to this Privacy Notice, it will be posted on our Website before the change becoming effective.
